content.version:
JOURNAL (just because I want it here :P )
I'm considering possible journal applications for the wiki, but I'm pretty sure that straight journal entries are out.
dreams - interpretations
events - different takes on it (others' perspectives?)
year in review - defining moments, etc.
personal timeline - defining moments

JOURNAL (just because I want it here :P )
I'm considering possible journal applications for the wiki, but I'm pretty sure that straight journal entries are out.
dreams - interpretations
events - different takes on it (others' perspectives?)
year in review - defining moments, etc.
personal timeline - defining moments
MARISSA WAS HERE! HAHA! :D .....sry Brandon....had to.

Journal Ideas
-text in xml/html(/sql?) -photo galleries -video galleries -audio recordings (pre-scripted vs. unscripted?) -daily log (point form, weather etc automatically included) -digital scrapbook -> one page for one topic, including all forms of media (ex: our summer vacation, my model airplane hobby, my graduation) -dream log -private/embarrassing entries
display methods: -web page -flash -word document
